flavorText:
"If this world could make a wish, it would be to survive the parasites who loot its treasures and threaten its life force."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

foreignData.flavorText: „Falls diese Welt einen Wunsch frei hätte, würde sie gerne die Parasiten loswerden, die ihre Schätze plündern und ihr die Lebenskraft rauben." —Saidah, Joraga-Jägerin
foreignData.name: Ewige Erde

foreignData.flavorText: "Si este mundo pudiera pedir un deseo, sería sobrevivir a los parásitos que saquean sus tesoros y amenazan su fuerza vital." —Saidah, cazadora de Joraga
foreignData.name: Terra eterna

foreignData.flavorText: « Si ce monde pouvait faire un vœu, ce serait de survivre aux parasites qui pillent ses trésors et sapent ses forces vitales. » —Saidah, chasseresse du Joraga
foreignData.name: Terra Eternalis

foreignData.flavorText: "Se questo mondo potesse esprimere un desiderio, sarebbe quello di sopravvivere ai parassiti che depredano i suoi tesori e ne minacciano la scintilla vitale." —Saidah, cacciatrice di Joraga
foreignData.name: Immortalità della Terra

foreignData.flavorText: 「この世界が何か一つ願うとしたら、それは宝を漁り自身の生命を脅かす寄生者から生き延びることだろうね。」 ――ジョラーガの狩人、サイダー
foreignData.name: 永遠の土
foreignData.text: すべての土地は破壊されない。

foreignData.flavorText: "Se este mundo pudesse fazer um pedido, seria para sobreviver aos parasitas que saqueiam seus tesouros e ameaçam sua força vital." — Saidah, caçadora de Joraga
foreignData.name: Eternidade Terrena

foreignData.flavorText: «Если бы мир мог загадать желание, оно заключалось бы в том, чтобы пережить паразитов, разграбляющих его сокровища и угрожающих его жизненной силе». — Саида, джорагская охотница
foreignData.name: Вечная Земля

foreignData.flavorText: 「若这世界能够祈祷，那就是能够从这些偷窃自己宝藏、威胁自己命脉的寄生虫手中活下来。」 ～玖瑞加猎人赛妲
foreignData.name: 永恒大地

name: Terra Eternal

rulings.text: Effects that say “destroy” won’t cause a land with indestructible to be put into its owner’s graveyard. If that land is also a creature, lethal damage won’t cause it to be put into its owner’s graveyard either. However, a land with indestructible can be put into the graveyard for a number of reasons. The most likely reasons are if it’s sacrificed, if it’s legendary and another legendary land with the same name is controlled by the same player, or if it’s also a creature and its toughness is 0 or less.
